item.title: Swashank Redemption Analysis
item.description: Hey I loved Swashank Redemption I really don’t care if u didn’t. I have done some analysis with my perspective. Red Red is the lifeline of the prison, the man who can smuggle almost anything into Shawshank from the outside world. By making himself indispensable to the other inmates, Red affords himself protection and an esteemed place in the pecking order of the prison yard. He forces the other men to do business on his terms and knows full well the need to defend his own interests in a world where violence and exploitation are the norm.
